I would recommend "The Dark Knight" based on your preferences for a film noir movie.

"The Dark Knight" is an American superhero film directed by Christopher Nolan and produced by Legendary Pictures. It is based on the Batman comics published by DC Comics.

The film stars Christian Bale as Bruce Wayne/Batman, Rachel Weisz as Dr. Marvella/Dr. Harriet, Joseph Gordon-Levitt as Harvey Dent/DD Bruce, Michael Caine as Alfred Pennyworth, Maggie Gyllenhaal as Rachel Dawson/Dawson, David Thewlis as John Doe, and Gary Oldman as Commodore Laughton.

The film was released on November 18, 2008 in the United States. It received mixed reviews from critics and audiences alike.

Overall, "The Dark Knight" is a highly entertaining and well-crafted superhero film that is definitely worth watching.
